text.label: - The DMA implementation of the LLD reserves the last 1KB of User Data in DSRAM for the DMA control structure!
- The DMA can not operate on PSRAM --> make sure variables used by the DMA are placed correctly!

action.data: MessageBox(Please select en event for Channel 0!)
